trans-unit.source: Page
This module allows you to create and edit webpages. It provides a template selector and management for different languages. This page module is part of the extension "TemplaVoil√† Plus".
Create and edit pages
Page Module
If you wish to edit the content of a page, please click the page title in the page tree on the left.
The requested page can't be found or is not accessible.
Shortcut
This page is of the type "shortcut". Instead of having content on its own, this page shows the content from the selected page "%s". Therefore you cannot edit the content of this page directly.

This page is of the type "shortcut". Instead of having content on its own, this page shows the content from the first sub page of current/selected page, which is "%s". Therefore you cannot edit the content of this page directly.

This page is of the type "shortcut". Instead of having content on its own, this page shows the content of a random sub page of current/selected page. Therefore you cannot edit the content of this page directly.

This page is of the type "shortcut". Instead of having content on its own, this page shows the content of parent page of current/selected page, which is "%s". Therefore you cannot edit the content of this page directly.
Jump to shortcut destination
External URL
This page refers to the external address "%s", you therefore cannot edit the content of this page directly.
This page refers to an external website, you therefore cannot edit the content of this page directly.
This page refers to an external FTP location, you therefore cannot edit the content of this page directly.
This page refers to an email address, you therefore cannot edit the content of this page directly.
Open external address (%s)
System folder
The current page is of the type "Sysfolder". Sysfolders usually don't contain content elements but are used for collecting other types of records in a single folder.
Switch to list view
Mount point
This page acts as a mount point and its content is being replaced by another page ("%s"). Therefore you cannot edit the content of this page directly.
Jump to source page of this mount point
Spacer
The current page is of the type "Spacer" and therfore cannot be edited.
Template Design
Please select a template design for this page.
Your user settings don't allow creating, moving or removing elements from this page.

Your settings indicate that you're either don't have the general right to edit page content, or you're not allowed to modify required tables or you're not allowed to edit the content fields. We suggest you recheck the settings or get in touch with your technical support.
This is a reference to an element on page %2$d.
Localizations
FCE
Error: This FCE has no mapping set.
